ags:resource.dc:title: Marketing research and strategy in agriculture of Georgia

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: For Georgian agricultural producing improvement and products distribution perspectives, in our theme we have separated agriculture marketing as a discipline in order to adjust the West marketing scientific achievements to our local agricultural markets. The theme objectives are: local agricultural market structure analyses methods and characteristics, local market penetration barriers, market dangers and market protection issues. Starting of mixing of brief history of Georgian and West world markets development, we have defined market research as marketing research main target, indicated sources of secondary information for Georgian farmers, noted when sellers give advices to consumers about their competitors, we have listed agricultural market segmentation specific groups and advices for effective marketing strategy formation. In the theme are elaborated practical recommendations for strategic marketing measures useful for farms, scientific, crediting, insurance institutions and, generally, for the EU-Georgia Association deep and comprehensive free trade agreement further successful cooperation.
